item.content:encoded:
The recent breakthrough in Artificial Intelligence (Al) stands as one of the most significant technological advancements of our time. With the rapid development of Al tools such as chatbots, Al editors, image generators, and various plugins, many people have already had the opportunity to test and explore these exciting innovations. Al’s transformative impact shines brightly in the digital and virtual reality realms.

But what else can AI change for us?  Explore how AI can change our lives in this text.

Our founder, Fausto Giunchiglia, shares a vision that is central to the creation of DataScientia. We believe that AI should advance for the greater good of humanity, benefiting everyone and improving the lives of individuals by addressing real-life situations beyond just web applications.

Achieving this goal requires research, innovative approaches, diverse and rich data from local contexts, and collaboration among experts. In this article, we will explore the principles behind our manifesto and discuss how AI can genuinely advance and change our lives. Fausto will elaborate on the future we envision for society and what motivates the members of DataScientia to work together.

In DataScientia, we are convinced that AI is not only about the virtual world, says Fausto. AI should be integrated into all aspects of our lives. AI should improve people’s lives and bring joy to our lives. To illustrate, AI can enhance our enjoyment of cooking by helping us find recipes or select the best restaurants. In sports, AI can assist with exercise routines like jogging. It can also enrich our cultural experiences by offering deeper insights into ancient civilizations and enhancing our understanding of the past through virtual tourism.

Fausto points out that while 20 years ago these experiences were primarily physical, many have now transitioned to digital formats. Today, we have digital heritage and virtual experiences that were previously unimaginable, providing new ways to connect with the world.

But what comes next? Given the increasing digitalization of our everyday activities, how can we further enjoy our lives and the real world?

Fausto explains that our community envisions AI very ambitious, as a tool to build better lives by fostering connections with friends and family and enhancing our overall quality of life. AI has the potential to assist in numerous ways, from planning events to enriching cultural experiences. For instance, AI can tailor the experience to your interests and provide personalized insights if you’re exploring a museum or learning about a new culture. AI also has applications in the culinary world, helping us understand and appreciate different foods and enhancing our present experiences. Looking to the future, AI’s role will only grow as current achievements will soon become part of our past.

Lastly, central to our’s vision is the concept of person-centered data, points Fasto. This type of data, which people share about their lives, is highly personal and not typically posted on social media. It includes intimate information about oneself and one’s family that is kept private. By utilizing this personal data, AI can significantly improve our lives and the lives of our loved onesIn conclusion, AI should focus on what is important for the future of humanity. DataScientia strives to bring this vision to life by advancing the power of AI to enhance the quality of life for all people. Follow our news to know learn better about AI and how we contrubute to its development.

Keywords: AI, technology, virtual tourism, digital heritage, foundational models, machine learning,  digitalization, private data, AI tools, AI applications, human-centric AI, data privacy.
